name: Lighton
description:
Lighton is a Minimalist Puzzle Game.

The goal in each level is to set up the circuit and turn on all the lights.


  • 50 hand-crafted levels;
  • A fun puzzle game (even for those who have no knowledge of electronic circuits);
  • Made for Sokoban style lovers;
  • Choose from 3 game play modes;
  • At some levels, it is possible to set up the circuit in more than one way;
  • If you make a short circuit on battery, it will explode. (Be careful).
